mapper.insert: insert into CHAT_MSG(MSG_NO, MEMBER_NAME, R_IDX, MSG_CONT, SEND_TIME) values (CHAT_MSG_SQE.nextval, #{member_Name}, #{r_Idx}, #{msg_Cont}, current_timestamp)
mapper.select: select /*+ INDEX_ASC(CHAT_MSG idx_chat_sendtime)*/ MSG_NO, MEMBER_NAME, R_IDX, MSG_CONT, SEND_TIME from CHAT_MSG where R_IDX = #{r_Idx} and ROWNUM <= 100 order by SEND_TIME
